scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:test
scripts.check: pnpm run lint && pnpm run check:type
scripts.check:type: pnpm run check:type:src && pnpm run check:type:test
scripts.check:type:test: pnpm run build && pnpm run check:type:test:tsc
scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:bundle && pnpm run build:zip
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit:coverage && pnpm run test:browser
scripts.test:browser: pnpm run test:browser:headless && pnpm run test:browser:xvfb
scripts.test:browser:headless: pnpm run build && playwright test --config ./chrome-extension/playwright.config.ts --project browser-headless
scripts.test:browser:xvfb: pnpm run build && xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args='-screen 0 1920x1080x24' pnpm exec playwright test --config ./chrome-extension/playwright.config.ts --project browser-xvfb
scripts.all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run check && pnpm run build && pnpm run test
